data.name: Label1.Text
data.value:
Effective Date: 01/31/2025
Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using the Inventory Sales Tracker system. By accessing or using the System, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use the System.
1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using the Inventory Sales Tracker system, you acknowledge that you have read,understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms, as well as any future modifications or updates.
2. System Usage The Inventory Sales Tracker system is intended to assist businesses in tracking and managing their sales and inventory data. Users must use the System in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. Unauthorized access, modification, or distribution of the System is strictly prohibited.
3. User Responsibilities Users are responsible for maintaining the security and confidentiality of their login credentials. Users must provide accurate and complete information when using the System. Users are solely responsible for any data they input into the System.
4. Data Management The System may store inventory and sales-related data. Users are responsible for regularly backing up their data. The provider does not guarantee the integrity or availability of data stored within the System.
5. Intellectual Property The System, including all associated content, features, and software, is protected by intellectual property laws. Users may not copy, modify, distribute, or reverse-engineer any part of the System without prior written consent.
6. Privacy Policy The use of the System is subject to the Privacy Policy, which outlines how user data is collected, stored, and used.
7. Prohibited Activities Users may not use the System to: Violate any laws or regulations. Distribute viruses or malicious code. Engage in unauthorized data collection or access. Disrupt the functionality of the System.
8. System Availability and Maintenance The provider reserves the right to modify, update, or temporarily suspend the System for maintenance or updates without prior notice. The provider is not responsible for any disruptions or data loss resulting from system maintenance or technical issues.
9. Termination The provider reserves the right to terminate or suspend access to the System at any time without notice if a user violates these Terms. Users may stop using the System at any time.
10. Limitation of Liability The provider shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential,or punitive damages arising from the use or inability to use the System.
11. Disclaimer of Warranties The System is provided "as-is" and "as-available" without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied.
12. Modification of Terms The provider reserves the right to update or modify these Terms at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes. Continued use of the System after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.
13. Contact Information For questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at joebananaservices@gmail.com.
